name: Smash 'n Dash
description:
Move with  W A S D, for extra speed dash with Spacebar. The pink ball is your damage dealer.

A brutally difficult Hack n' Slash Arcade Game, inspired by classics from the '90s.  Dash away from enemies and swing your little friend to demolish them. Try to build up velocity to hit them even harder and bash those pesky pests into another dimension, but be careful not to lose your little pink friend. Collect hearts while dodging projectiles and survive the endless waves with increasing difficulty.  Good luck and have fun!
